attribute.description: DOM attribute for applying a color scheme.

colorSchemeNode.description: The node (provided as string) used to attach the color-scheme attribute.

defaultDarkColorScheme.description: The default color scheme to be used in dark mode.

defaultLightColorScheme.description: The default color scheme to be used in light mode.

defaultMode.description: The default mode when the storage is empty (user's first visit).

nonce.description: Nonce string to pass to the inline script for CSP headers.
